scripts.dev: concurrently "yarn workspace @doday/client run start" "yarn workspace @doday/server run start:dev"
scripts.build:api: yarn workspace @doday/api run clean && yarn workspace @doday/api run build
scripts.build:lib: yarn workspace @doday/lib run clean && yarn workspace @doday/lib run build
scripts.build:shared: yarn workspace @doday/shared run clean && yarn workspace @doday/shared run build
scripts.build:ducks: yarn workspace @doday/ducks run clean && yarn workspace @doday/ducks run build
scripts.build:activities: yarn workspace @doday/activities run clean && yarn workspace @doday/activities run build
scripts.clean:all: yarn clean:api && yarn clean:lib && yarn clean:ducks && yarn clean:activities && yarn clean:shared
scripts.build:all: yarn build:lib && yarn build:api && yarn build:ducks && yarn build:shared && yarn build:activities
